name: Aden Agro
goal: Aden Agro is active in EU agricultural affairs, with a focus on agro-food policy advisory and public affairs services. Additional services include agro-food export advisory, access to EU funding programs, public relations, business development and organization of agro study-visits, for private entities, sector representative associations and governmental bodies alike.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Common agricultural policy
Food safety - Sanitary and phytosanitary policies
EU organic regulation
EU protein plan
RED II, ILUC, Bioenergy policy
Rules of origin
Food Marketing standards
Research and innovation
EU funding programmes
Development and cooperation
EU trade agreement negotiations (agriculture)
